description:
An unexpected windfall pits the members of the Onigami house against each other as they vie for popularity among the Chimimo.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: 10 Man En Soudatsu Jigoku / Shuurai! Jigoku Senpai
10万円争奪地獄 / 襲来! 地獄先輩
Hell-Bent on a Stack of Money / Yikes! The Senpai from Hell Arrives
